The method of N. Sarkozy is every day a surprise. But the bad surprise, the French have for 5 years. #StEtienne # FH2012
In the President of the Republic, there is a tendency to permanent luster as the only mode of communication. #StEtienne # FH2012
Now N. Sarkozy will have to explain why he is a candidate, and he will not escape his own record. #StEtienne # FH2012
The French will not be impressed either by surprise announcements or referendums that we do not know what they will be.
I want to convince the French that there is a destiny different from that which has been reserved to us for 5 years. #StEtienne # FH2012
The joining of C.Boutin with N.Sarkozy and the very probable abandonment of H.Morin do not surprise me! #StEtienne # FH2012
I want to remind you that I have respect for the Communist Party, I have respect for communist influence and for the Left Front.
I wish a rally of the left with all its sensibilities next May. #StEtienne # FH2012

At 9:00AM AEDT the PM will be delivering a Prime Ministerial Statement on Closing the Gap. Watch it live here - http://t.co/7LnAF3eI TeamJG
RT @RecAustralia: We're at parliament house to hear @JuliaGillard's close the gap speech #closethegap #reconciliation
We'll be live-tweeting the PM's Prime Ministerial Statement on Closing the Gap from 9:00AM AEDT, so stay tuned. TeamJG
PM: "Every day, our conscience demands we work to Close the Gap."
@tobyadams80 You can watch it online here - http://t.co/7LnAF3eI TeamJG
PM: "Closing the Gap targets are not meant just to challenge us to do more – they are designed to hold us accountable to our ambitions."
PM: "Today’s Closing the Gap Report shows that the foundations for overcoming Indigenous disadvantage are in place."
RT @Mlopezbonilla: Inaugurating the project "Safe Municipality" in Mixco. With @ottoperezmolina, @ottoperezl, # NoéAnzueto. http://t.co/x1aiLLi6
PM: "4 years into a 25 year project, this much is true: health outcomes, employment outcomes, education outcomes are improving"
PM: "Perhaps the ultimate manifestation of respect is constitutional recognition of Indigenous Australians."
PM: "In 2010 I announced the appointment of an Expert Panel on Constitutional Recognition of Indigenous Australians..."
PM: "The Government is committed to this change – we are committed to building public support for this change..."
PM: "Today, we know we have a long way to go but we also know we are Closing the Gap."

"Our rule is one of the best in the world if applied correctly, and a model of unity. We should strengthen and protect it"
I am today in Rouen, a city where I spent my childhood. Here are some memories of that time: http://t.co/IFB1M9ur # FH2012
visits the Military Rehabilitation Center Aardenburg in Doorn and receives an explanation about the CAREN rehabilitation device. Photo: http://t.co/oIcX9Y6n
At #Rouen Town Hall with @LaurentFabius before I visit the M'Real stationery in Alizay. # FH2012 http://t.co/eFYBcECT
I'll meet you at 18h at the Zenith of #Rouen! Here are exclusive the last preparations: http://t.co/SZZuy3Kl # FH2012
Change is now in Rouen! Follow this big gathering live: http://t.co/flJsTjV5 on my campaign site. # FH2012
If we do not accept the mechanism of appointments that have been approved, then we are still far from the democratic spirit - MS
I am very happy to meet you, many, tonight in Rouen, in this city where I was born and where I grew up! # FH2012
I am very proud to be your presidential candidate. # FH2012
My responsibility: to allow France to change its President, of politics, of majority. Allow to change your future! # FH2012
I have never been one of those who anticipated a France without a factory because I know there is no economy without industry! # FH2012
Since a few weeks, rescues of circumstances have been organized: is this a vision, an ambition? No, a calculation. # FH2012
Yes I will change the taxation, it will be more favorable to SMEs than multinationals! # FH2012
The recovery will be possible only if finance is dominated! # FH2012
Finance dominates and does not need to be invited to the 20 hours of TF1! # FH2012
I see today the excesses of this system, including for our Europe where the rating agencies decide. # FH2012
No French bank will be able to have any more activity in the tax havens. # FH2012
I will propose a real tax on financial transactions. # FH2012
We must make the transition from an old world to a new world that is slow to emerge. # FH2012
We must be the actors of this mutation! # FH2012
We are living in an exceptional period, a global crisis that must be regarded as a challenge and not a fatality. # FH2012
Soon comes the time of choice: France must determine its future. Between continuity and change, I propose change!
The news of the day: the president-candidate is now candidate-president. What news! # FH2012
I'll tell you a secret: I thought so! As soon as he entered, he was already out! # FH2012
Since 2007, not a week without the resources of the state are at the service of a man who has only one idea: stay in power.
I wish for France a debate worthy and up to the challenge. This is our country. # FH2012
France is fraternity. It's not withdrawal, rejection, fear. # FH2012
The scenario is written: the president has been mistaken for 5 years, but precisely, it will be his experience!
There would be excuses for this balance sheet, for this policy that systematically favored the favored.
The people of the haves, the people of the leaders are going to him, better, since 5 years. # FH2012
This five-year period began with a shield to protect the richest. It ends with a club: the rise in VAT. # FH2012
It's not a balance sheet, it's a fiasco! # FH2012
They seek to oppose, to divide, to tear. We even invent an alleged hierarchy among civilizations. # FH2012
We will fight with all our strength for a society that brings together. # FH2012
I make this promise here: I will not be the President who divides, I will be the President who hosts who gathers, who meets # FH2012
The first of my values ​​is the truth. Without the truth, there is no democracy. # FH2012
The path that I am showing is demanding, but at the end, there is the restoration of the country. # FH2012
My second value is work. Where is the respect for work today? # FH2012
Jaurès said: "work is freedom!" # FH2012
France is strong only if it is right! # FH2012
Youth will be the top priority of the next five years. We will gather around his future. # FH2012
The France we want is not the France of the debt but the France of justice. # FH2012
I have other values, such as respect. Respect for institutions: everywhere and for everyone! # FH2012
Respect is also about having laws that apply everywhere and the right to safety. # FH2012
And then there is another value: human dignity. It is she who will make us engage in a large housing policy. # FH2012
It is in the name of dignity that I will restore the equality of French people to access care. # FH2012
It is in the name of dignity that we will uphold equal pay for men and women. # FH2012
These are my values. They have a name: progress! # FH2012
My values ​​are those which will carry the idea that the coming generation must live better than ours. That's it, the republican dream!
A presidential election - so decisive at the moment, so powerful a mobilization - is also talking to the people. # FH2012
To speak to the people is not to flatter the instincts of facility. # FH2012
To speak to the people is not to regard youth as a burden or strangers as a threat. # FH2012
The only referendum I know is May 6, the presidential election. # FH2012
Want to continue 5 more years with the same President? Do you want to change your policy? Here is the referendum of May 6! # FH2012
The strength of the incoming President is very different from the strength of the outgoing President! # FH2012
The vote of May 6th is a vote for France and for Europe. We are expected, hoped. # FH2012
We are 66 days from the first round. I count them! # FH2012
I do not turn away from my goal: to win the left, to advance France! # FH2012
The debate is underway, I wish it is at the right height, but I know from experience that nothing will be spared. # FH2012
Do not be intimidated. The right has always played with fears. # FH2012
It is the left that has always straightened our country, at decisive moments in our history. # FH2012
I give you an appointment for the change on April 22! Long live the Republic and long live France! # FH2012
